channel.title: Npcs walk anywhere
channel.description:
for some erason my npcs walk anywher someone leads them which has caused some problems
ive tried changeing the walking range in the autospawn cfg but they still follow ppl anywhere does anyone know something i could do to fix this

item.title: Npcs walk anywhere
item.dc:creator: @ryan_justin ryan justin
item.description:
@ryan_justin wrote:

for example if you goin to the wild and attack a green dragon it will follow and try to attack you as long as you stay in range of it. so people lead it to edgeville then teleport and it sits there and attacks people

id just like it to stay in a certain range but even if its not moving when its not being attacked it still follows when it is.

Read full topic

item.title: Npcs walk anywhere
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

So you want them to stop walking, or you want them to walk in a certain range?

How exactly are they ‘following’ people?

Read full topic
